title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\RequestMirrorPolicy
name: RequestMirrorPolicy
description:
A policy that specifies how requests intended for the route's backends are shadowed to a separate mirrored backend service. Loadbalancer does not wait for responses from the shadow service. Prior to sending traffic to the shadow service, the host / authority header is suffixed with -shadow.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.RequestMirrorPolicy

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.backend_service
params.description: The full or partial URL to the BackendService resource being mirrored to.
